languages.text:
Psyber Raven has +30 Willpower
The targets of first Psy Power {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relayed{/g} each turn automatically fail their tests to resist it's effects.
If first Psy Power {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relayed{/g} per turn targets at least 3 units, Overseer gains 1 AP.

traits.locale_text:
Psyber Raven has +30 Willpower

If first Psy Power {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relayed{/g} per turn targets at least 3 units, Overseer gains 1 AP.

languages.text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Targets of the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} automatically fail their {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against that psychic power.
If the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} psychic power in a turn affects 3 or more creatures, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Псайберворон получает +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}.
Цели первой {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслированной{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} автоматически проваливают {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверку на сопротивление{/g} ее действию.
Если первая {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслированная{/g} психосила за ход воздействует на 3 или более существ, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} восстанавливает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 Willpower.
The targets of the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} psychic power in a turn automatically fail their resistance tests against that psychic power.
If the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} psychic power in a turn affects 3 or more creatures, the Overseer regains +1 AP.

languages.text:
Ruhsiber kuzgun +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} içinde ilk {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktarılan{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücünün{/g} hedefleri, o ruhsezi gücüne karşı {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testlerinde{/g} otomatik olarak başarısız olur.
Bir tur içinde ilk {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktarılan{/g} ruhsezi gücü, 3 veya daha fazla yaratığı etkilediyse {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP'sini{/g} geri kazanır.

Ruhsiber kuzgun +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} içinde ilk {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktarılan{/g} ruhsezi gücünün hedefleri, o ruhsezi gücüne karşı {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testlerinde{/g} otomatik olarak başarısız olur.
Bir tur içinde ilk {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktarılan{/g} ruhsezi gücü, 3 veya daha fazla yaratığı etkilediyse {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} +1 EP'sini geri kazanır.

languages.text:
El psicocuervo recibe +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
Los objetivos del primer poder psíquico {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmitido{/g} en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} fallan automáticamente la {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} contra ese {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g}.
Si el primer poder psíquico que se {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} en un turno afecta por lo menos a 3 criaturas, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} recupera +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Targets of the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} automatically fail their {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against that psychic power.
If the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} psychic power in a turn affects 3 or more creatures, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El psicocuervo recibe +30 de Voluntad.
Los objetivos del primer poder psíquico {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmitido{/g} en cada turno fallan automáticamente la prueba de fortaleza contra ese poder psíquico.
Si el primer poder psíquico que se {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} en un turno afecta por lo menos a 3 criaturas, el supervisor recupera +1 PA.

languages.text:
生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高30点。
每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，当首次{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}生效时，所有受到此能力影响的目标如果需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，则抗性检定会自动失败。
每回合中，如果首次{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}的灵能能力至少影响了3个单位，则{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Targets of the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} automatically fail their {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against that psychic power.
If the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} psychic power in a turn affects 3 or more creatures, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
生化渡鸦的意志提高30点。
每回合中，当首次{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}的灵能能力生效时，所有受到此能力影响的目标如果需要进行抗性检定，则抗性检定会自动失败。
每回合中，如果首次{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}的灵能能力至少影响了3个单位，则监察官获得1点行动点数。

languages.text:
Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
Ziele der ersten {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragenen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kraft{/g} in einem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} scheitern automatisch bei ihren {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen diese psionische Kraft.
Wenn die erste {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragene{/g} psionische Kraft in einem Zug 3 oder mehr Kreaturen betrifft, regeneriert der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Targets of the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} automatically fail their {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against that psychic power.
If the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} psychic power in a turn affects 3 or more creatures, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +30 Willenskraft.
Ziele der ersten {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragenen{/g} psionischen Kraft in einem Zug scheitern automatisch bei ihren Widerstandsproben gegen diese psionische Kraft.
Wenn die erste {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragene{/g} psionische Kraft in einem Zug 3 oder mehr Kreaturen betrifft, regeneriert der Aufseher +1 AP.

languages.text:
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +30.
Les cibles du premier {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} échouent automatiquement aux {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} contre ce même pouvoir psychique.
Si le premier pouvoir psychique {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} au cours d'un tour affecte au moins 3 créatures, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} récupère +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Targets of the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} automatically fail their {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against that psychic power.
If the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} psychic power in a turn affects 3 or more creatures, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de Force mentale de +30.
Les cibles du premier pouvoir psychique {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} au cours d'un tour échouent automatiquement aux tests de résistance contre ce même pouvoir psychique.
Si le premier pouvoir psychique {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayé{/g} au cours d'un tour affecte au moins 3 créatures, le surveillant récupère +1 PA.

languages.text:
サイバーレイヴンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}は+30される。
1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に最初に{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}のターゲットは、自動的にその超能力に対する{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗する。
1ターン中に最初に{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}超能力によって3体以上の生物が影響を受ける場合、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を+1回復する。
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
Targets of the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} automatically fail their {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against that psychic power.
If the first {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} psychic power in a turn affects 3 or more creatures, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

1ターン中に最初に{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}超能力によって3体以上の生物が影響を受ける場合、監督者はAPを+1回復する。
